title: LF Peeps for team! :D (top and support)
body:
We are looking for RELIABLE AND ACTIVE players for our team. We are mainly looking for silver+ players that are flexible. We're very serious about practice and attitude when we play. The ultimate goal is for us to all improve as a team and as individual players. You're welcome to join if you want to improve with us and have some fun

Message me or qwertyuiopman in game or post on here (but prefer in game) MUST HAVE SKYPE!

replies.body:
ign: deathangel 
i got skype 
i main support 
i am bronze but if u give me a honest run i WILL prove u wrong 
i am active everyday

Hey man, im silver 1 going on gold whod like to play top lane for you
ign Vitrolix, if youd like to chat
heyy man  i can play any role, im low bronze, im a reliable and active player, i have an aggressive play style but im quite friendly personality. my ign is "Esgaroth"

Hey man i can play top lane for you i am current unranked as i dont enjoy playing solo q, however i feel i have played with golds and done well so i feel i could get along my in game name is "the oce thresh"
